explanation: [0-0] In the foreground, a right hand holds a mobile phone to record the scene. A man wearing a red and white striped shirt is standing on a stool behind a door. The man is looking upward with his mouth slightly open and teeth closed. His right arm rests on the door frame, holding a pink balloon in his right hand and a pair of scissors in his left hand. In another room, a woman in a black top can be seen. There are sofas and a coffee table in the room. Plants and decorations are placed on the coffee table. Banknotes are scattered on the ground leading from the woman's room to the man's room.

[0-3] The man holds the scissors in his left hand, the tip pointing upwards. He opens his mouth, closes his eyes, and shakes his head while smiling. Then, he clenches his teeth and raises his left hand holding the scissors. The woman walks forward, looks down at the banknotes on the ground, covers her mouth with her hands, and then squats down to pick them up. Afterward, she looks up and sees the balloon in the man's right hand. She puts down the banknotes, turns right, and picks up a green object. The mobile phone in the foreground continues to record.

Then, she puts it on her left leg, and her lower body becomes transparent. Next, she puts it on her hands, and they also become transparent in the phone's view. Finally, she puts on a hat and pulls the zipper in front of her. The woman becomes completely invisible in the mobile phone. The man is still standing on the stool, raising his left arm holding the scissors, with a smile on his face, and looking down.

[12-19] Then, the woman walks into the man's room and squats down, pulling the banknotes on the ground backwards. The man looks down and sees the banknotes moving backward. He opens his mouth with a surprised expression on his face. Then, he lowers his left hand. The woman picks up the banknotes with both hands and runs to the left. The man gets off the stool and chases after her.
